name: CyberMonk (Matt Davis)
description:
CyberMonk is a 2-4 player competitive laser puzzler which will put your resourcefulness and spatial reasoning to the test. Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018.

Gamepads required, Xbox preferred.

Programming: Rhys van der Waerden, Matt Davis

Audio: Angus Arnold

Art: Adam Robertson, Alexander Jenkins
